mapper.select: SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC WHERE PR.IS_FINISHED = 'Y' AND PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY PR.ID DESC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE PR.ID = #{projectId}
AND PR.IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE PR.IS_FINISHED = 'N' AND PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY PR.END_DATE ASC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE PR.IS_DELETED = 'Y' ORDER BY PR.START_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME, COUNT(P.ID) AS CURRENT_PARTICIPANT_COUNT FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID LEFT JOIN PARTICIPANT P ON PR.ID = P.PROJECT_ROOM_ID WHERE PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND PR.IS_FINISHED = 'N' AND PR.START_DATE >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY PR.ID HAVING COUNT(P.ID) < PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT ORDER BY PR.START_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND PR.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%') ORDER BY PR.ID DESC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE TC.ID = #{categoryId} AND PR.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%') ORDER BY PR.ID ASC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN PARTICIPANT P ON PR.ID = P.PROJECT_ROOM_ID JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY PR.START_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.ID, PR.NAME, PR.CONTENT, PR.IS_FINISHED, PR.IS_DELETED, PR.DURATION_TIME, PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PR.SESSION_CODE, PR.START_DATE, PR.END_DATE, PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, PR.INTRODUCTION, PR.PROJECT_URL, TC.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID, TC.NAME AS TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE PR.ID = #{projectId} AND PR.IS_FINISHED = 'N' AND PR.IS_DELETED = 'N'
